body: Normally, snipers are not given much credit and may even be considered as cowards, but they actually contribute much to a team by controlling bridges, supporting front line, etc. Therefore, I'd like to give credit to the best snipers/archers who are usually under the radar in terms of pvp skill with this post! Who, in your opinion, are the top 10 archers on Avicus?
body_tagged: Normally, snipers are not given much credit and may even be considered as cowards, but they actually contribute much to a team by controlling bridges, supporting front line, etc. Therefore, I'd like to give credit to the best snipers/archers who are usually under the radar in terms of pvp skill with this post! Who, in your opinion, are the top 10 archers on Avicus?
title: Top 10 Archers?

replies.body:
They get considered cowards when they literally do nothing but snipe. By this I mean stand 1 block from someone and repeatedly spamming/shooting them. U can now spam to start a sword combo but yea.

On topic. I don't know snipers but I've got.a 130 something block snipe before

replies.body: On Topic: I don't know any standout archers, but I tend to get in a good sniper duel with CrafterPete a lot, so props to him for always giving me one hell of a fight ;)
